# FueGenix

> FueGenix is an exclusive hair restoration clinic in the Netherlands serving high net worth individuals, business leaders, celebrities and royalty. Led by Dr. Munib Ahmad (IAHRS), we deliver a 99% graft survival rate with results undetectable at close range. Investment from €50,000. Fly-out service from €500,000.

## Core Facts

- Clinic location: Bergen op Zoom, Netherlands
- Lead surgeon: Dr. Munib Ahmad
- Credentials: IAHRS member, ISHRS member, BIG-registered
- Graft survival rate: 99% documented
- In-clinic investment: From €50,000
- Fly-out investment: From €500,000
- Consultation fee: €1,000 (applied to procedure)
- Recognition: Ape to Gentleman best hair transplant doctors list, 5 consecutive years
- Press: Medical Daily, Ape to Gentleman
- Model: Single-patient, surgeon-led, one patient per day

## International Service

- Clients travel from the United States, Gulf region (UAE, Saudi Arabia, Qatar), United Kingdom, and across Europe
- Private fly-out service available worldwide (from €500,000)
- The only hair transplant clinic offering surgeon-led fly-out to any global location
- Featured on Ape to Gentleman best hair transplant doctors list 5 consecutive years
- Patients referred through private networks from the US, Gulf region, Europe, Asia, and Australia
- Dr. Ahmad and full medical team travel to client's chosen location

## Specialisation

- Follicular Unit Extraction (FUE) and Sapphire techniques
- Hairline artistry with natural irregularity
- Precision angulation matching original growth patterns
- Single-hair to multi-hair graft transition for natural density gradient
- Results that pass the "comb-through test" at close range
- Designed to age gracefully over decades

## Clientele

- High net worth individuals
- Business leaders and executives
- Celebrities and public figures
- Royalty
- Patients from the United States, the Gulf region, the United Kingdom, and across Europe, Asia, and Australia
- Typically referred through private networks

## Privacy and Discretion

- Single-patient model with no shared spaces
- No visible signage, private entrance and exit
- NDA-level confidentiality as standard
- Encrypted communications
- Complete discretion from consultation through recovery
